data.text: @westaustralian As a relief teacher. I don’t understand why they don’t take the east coast approach.  Students can come back to  school, but the teacher can’t, schools don’t know how many students will return.2,20. Relief teachers teach a day, positive case  and have to isolate for  a week. 🙄

@westaustralian This is a pandemic & a State of Emergency. You cannot have that & NOT have a Royal Commission into the Response to COVID. This has to happen & include putting a spotlight on Bureacrats & MPs. Texts, Emails & go looking for Political interference/priorities.
@westaustralian Wow! If this woman sucked up his backside any harder she'd be caught between McClowns cheeks🤣🤣 a sheep right there🤣🤣
@westaustralian That goes to show the hoax the government has been playing with the people of WA😡
@westaustralian Why do we have the Government of idiots? Do they honestly think they are delivering the best for the people? Just simply #DoNotComply as people have all the power if we stay united!
@westaustralian High case numbers. A more contagious variant. Time to relax protections.
@mag_down_under2 @westaustralian They didn’t have to spin it … your grubberment did
@watch2o @westaustralian Critical care workers are mandated and boosted … or sacked … what’s your point mate ??? …
